panels.content: These panels show an overview on the write path. Visit the following specific dashboards to drill down into the write path: - Writes - Writes resources - Writes networking
These panels show an overview on the read path. Visit the following specific dashboards to drill down into the read path: - Reads - Reads resources - Reads networking - Queries - Compactor

These panels show an overview on the recording and alerting rules evaluation. Visit the following specific dashboards to drill down into the rules evaluation and alerts notifications: - Ruler - Alertmanager - Alertmanager resources

panels.title: Alerting notifications sent to Alertmanager / sec

panels.content: These panels show an overview on the long-term storage (object storage). Visit the following specific dashboards to drill down into the storage: - Object store - Compactor

panels.title: Total number of blocks in the storage
